metadata.description: In the golden age of piracy, Captain Kidd, Blackbeard, and Black Bart Roberts, the three most reviled pirates in history, contend for the most sacred prize the world has ever known - the lost Relics of Christ! This absolute edition collects the entire sold-out series hailed by critics and fans alike as "Pirates of the Caribbean meets Indiana Jones." Featuring a cover illustration by Ben Templesmith (30 Days of Night).
metadata.name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
